nodes.text: Sometime after 4980 BBY, the slave Dakar Sol led a rebellion against the reconstituted Sith Empire on the planet Malachor V. Sol's rebellion was the largest of its kind in the entire history of the Empire, though the slave rebellion on the capital of Dromund Kaas during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Empire came close to the size of the Malachor uprising.

The slave rebellion on Malachor V was first mentioned in the "Rebelling Slaves" Codex entry in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing video game released by BioWare and LucasArts in 2011.
